content.webTitle: Is it worth buying a pricey electric toothbrush?

fields.headline: Is it worth buying a pricey electric toothbrush?
fields.bodyText: Every week a Guardian Money reader submits a question, and it’s up to you to help him or her out – a selection of the best answers will appear in next Saturday’s paper. I’ve seen electric toothbrushes in Boots and there’s a huge price difference. There are Philips ones for £299, Oral-Bs for £140, but other Oral-Bs for £35, and a Colgate for £18. I need to know what’s the difference between all the models particularly as they all look much the same? Do you have a problem readers could solve? Email your suggestions to money@theguardian.com or write to us at Money, the Guardian, Kings Place, 90 York Way, London N1 9GU.
